TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的组合框。

span.span: Displays a combo box in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的用于显示一个组合框控件，这是与列表中选择字段结合使用的编辑字段。The class is a specialized type of used to display a combo box control, which is an editing field combined with a list selection field. 当前所选主机中哪些用户可以更改该单元格的值，假定该单元格的属性设置为`false`。The currently selected hosts a in which the user can change the cell's value, assuming the cell's property is set to `false`. 与不同控件，没有和属性。Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反，从下拉列表中选择一个值设置的单元格属性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 列类型专用于保留此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下，函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列的单元格模式的现有后，设置列的到要用作一种模式的单元格的属性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关属性是同样名称的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格在基于的模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关的属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格并刷新列显示如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 通常会使用类型，除非你想要重写特定单元格的列值。You will typically work with the type unless you want to override column values for specific cells. 中介绍的指导原则类概述主题面向填充下拉列表将适用于单元格和列的实例。The guidelines described in the class overview topic for populating the drop-down list applies to both cell and column instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类，该方法使用类。The following code example demonstrates the class, which makes use of the class. 你可以设置的单元格， ，和方式在此示例中设置相应的列属性完全相同的属性。You can set the cell , , and properties in the same way that the corresponding column properties are set in this example. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法每当派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象`CreateAccessibilityInstance`方法支持 [UI 自动化](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)仅在开始使用.NET 的.NET framework 目标版本，将重新编译的应用程序中的属性Framework 4.7.2。The object returned by the `CreateAccessibilityInstance` method supports the [UI Automation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md) property only in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向.NET Framework 的早期版本，但在.NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行的应用程序可以选择启用此功能使用兼容性开关。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅[What's New in.NET Framework 中的辅助功能](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源，其数据包含下拉列表中可能会显示的选项。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source whose data contains the possible selections shown in the drop-down list.

value.span: 一个 或 ，它包含一个值集合，用于向下拉列表提供数据。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to the drop-down list.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常将此属性设置为整个列的单元格到属性。Typically this property is set for an entire column of cells through the property. 如果可能，请设置到包含仅的可能选择，如选择一列的源。If possible, set to a source containing only the possible selections, like a column of selections. 则属性不需要设置。Then the property doesn't need to be set. 但如果源是更复杂，设置为要从中检索可能的选项的属性或列的名称。But if the source is more complicated, set to the name of the property or column from which to retrieve possible selections. 如果已设置为一个字符串数组，则和不需要因为数组中的每个字符串将用于值和显示设置。If is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 更改属性导致的单元格重新初始化其集合并重绘自身。Changing the property causes the cell to reinitialize its collection and redraw itself. 当你更改的值属性，该控件将尝试使用和属性值与新的数据源，并将每个属性设置为`null`如果找不到它的值。When you change the value of the property, the control attempts to use the and property values with the new data source, and sets each property to `null` if its value cannot be found. 此过程中发生任何异常中的内容将被忽略，除非它是以下关键异常之一： ， ， ， ， ， ，或。Any exception that occurs during this process is ignored unless it is one of the following critical exceptions: , , , , , , or . 当设置，将附加到的数据源的事件。When the is set, the attaches to the event of the data source. 当是分离，不会立即释放资源。When the is detached from the , the resource is not immediately released. 释放附加的数据源时释放资源。The resource is released when the attached data source is disposed. 若要立即释放垃圾回收的资源，设置属性`null`。To release the resource for garbage collection immediately, set the property to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定要在何处收集将在下拉列表中显示的选项。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather selections to display in the drop-down list.

value.span: 一个字符串，它指定在 属性中指定的数据源中的属性或列的名称。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值是 ，它指示将不会使用 属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the property will not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示组合框下拉列表中显示的文本信息。 represents the text information displayed in the combo box drop-down list. 与此相反，属性表示的选择内容的相应值。In contrast, the property represents the corresponding value of a selection. 如果通过显示的数据所做的选择应该从非默认属性或列的绘制，然后必须设置为除。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 当设置为一个字符串数组，不需要设置，因为数组中的每个字符串将用作有效的显示字符串和一个有效的基础值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 另一种加载组合框来选择是使用属性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必须包含用来收集所选内容的属性名称。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定当组合框处于非编辑模式时它的显示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when it is not in edit mode.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响该单元格的外观，它未处于编辑模式，并时，无论是否只读的。The property affects the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode, and regardless of whether it is read-only. 当该单元格处于编辑模式时，它始终如下所示控件。When the cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果属性值是`true`、属性会影响该单元格，仅当它是当前单元格时。If the property value is `true`, the property affects the cell only when it is the current cell. 行为和外观的下拉箭头将由属性。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow is indicated by the property. 若要启用单元格突出显示当鼠标指针在单元格上时，必须设置属性和属性值设置为。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over the cell, you must set the property to and the property value to . 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合框仅处理文本信息，因为基础的格式化值的类型始终是。Because a combo box only handles text information, the type of the underlying formatted value is always . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在单元格内容的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此示例中，属性用于确定该单元格是否包含尝试将该值转换前。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将一个单元格值转换为等效的显示值的类型由指示属性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件将单元格的值传递给此方法在`value`参数。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 此方法首先确定是否`value`无效通过确定是否满足以下条件之一。This method first determines whether `value` is valid by determining whether one of the following conditions is met. - `value` 存在于或集合。`value` is present in the or the collection. - `value` 是 `null` 或 。`value` is `null` or . - `value` 是和属性值表示类型。`value` is and the property value represents the type. 如果`value`无效，事件发生。If `value` is not valid, the event occurs. 如果没有为此事件或处理程序集的处理程序属性`true`，将引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果`value`无效或没有处理程序事件，而且它不会设置属性`true`、事件发生。If `value` is valid or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. A事件处理程序可以同时修改`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果处理程序不会设置属性`true`，但是，此方法设置的格式`value`使用的格式设置属性`cellStyle`对象。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 这可能会导致附加事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式设置操作成功，此方法将返回以在中显示的格式化的值控件。If formatting is successful, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

exception.span: 格式化失败，这是由于 控件的 事件无处理程序或处理程序将 属性设置为 而引起的。

span.span: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the event of the control or the handler set the property to .

exception.span: 出现类型转换错误时，通常可以将异常对象强制转换为类型 ，或者当无法在 或 集合中找到 时，将异常对象强制转换为类型 。

span.span: The exception object can typically be cast to type for type conversion errors or to type if cannot be found in the or the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化托管控制基中所述方法。The method initializes the hosted control as described in the base method. 此外，对于每个调用，执行下列任务：In addition, for every invocation, does the following: - 设置托管的视觉属性控件，如， ，和，用于匹配当前单元格的相应属性。Sets the visual properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 设置托管的数据绑定属性控件，如， ，和，用于匹配当前单元格的相应属性。Sets the data-bound properties of the hosted control, such as , , and , to match the corresponding properties of the current cell. - 重新初始化属性将托管的控件。Reinitializes the property of the hosted control. 此方法也会调整单元格的维度，以适应宿主控件。This method also adjusts the cell's dimensions to accommodate the hosted control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 有关详细信息可以使用执行的任务集合，请参阅。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the collection, see . 如果字符串添加到，然后和不需要由于添加每个字符串将用于值和显示设置。If strings are added to , then and do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display. > [!NOTE] > 不支持多个具有相同的显示值项使用。 does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values. 如果设置属性，则属性不能使用。If the property is set, then the property cannot be used. 单元格格式化的值必须始终是中的值之一集合或错误会发生，单元格的值将恢复到集合中的第一项。The formatted value of the cell must always be one of the values in the collection or an error will occur and the cell value will revert to the first item in the collection. 您可以通过处理自定义此行为和事件。You can customize this behavior by handling the and events. 此属性设置为父列的值以外的值属性将强制该行成为非共享行，分配额外的内存。Setting this property to a value other than the value of the parent column's property will force the row to become unshared, allocating extra memory. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性控件设置为或，控件使用此方法来确定是否以外此单元格有焦点用户按下 F2 键将导致单元格以进入编辑模式。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 此方法返回`true`如果 e 参数指示以下键或键组合之一： F4、 ALT + 向上箭头、 ALT + 向下箭头或 （如字母、 数字、 标点符号或空间密钥） 的普通的数据输入密钥未修改形式按 ALT 或 ctrl 键，不包括按 SHIFT + 空格键，由该控件用于选择目的。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates one of the following keys or key combinations: F4, ALT+UP ARROW, ALT+DOWN ARROW, or an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标处理在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定是否将托管对现有条目进行排序并将新条目添加到列表中的相应排序位置。This property specifies whether the hosted sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list. 当此属性设置为`false`，新项添加到现有列表的末尾。When this property is set to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list. 在排序操作是不区分大小写，并且按字母升序排序。The sorting operation is case-insensitive and performed in alphabetically ascending order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#30)]

exception.span: 尝试对附加到数据源的单元格进行排序。

span.span: An attempt was made to sort a cell that is attached to a data source.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定要在何处收集下拉列表中使用的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies where to gather the underlying values used in the drop-down list.

value.span: 指定属性名称或列名称的字符串。

span.span: A string specifying the name of a property or column.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示会忽略此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示所选内容的相应值。 represents the corresponding value of a selection. 与此相反，属性表示下拉列表中显示的文本信息。In contrast, the property represents the text information displayed in the drop-down list. 属性指定的值显示在下拉列表中选择的数据源。The property specifies the data source for the value of the selections displayed in the drop-down list. 如果通过显示的数据所做的选择应该从非默认属性或列的绘制，然后必须设置为除。If the data for the selections displayed by the is supposed to be drawn from a nondefault property or column of the , then must be set in addition to . 当设置为一个字符串数组，不需要设置，因为数组中的每个字符串将用作有效的显示字符串和一个有效的基础值。When is set to a string array, does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and a valid underlying value. 另一种加载组合框来选择是使用属性。Another way of loading combo box selections is to use the property. 必须包含用来收集所选内容的属性名称。 must contain the property name from which to gather the selections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]
